joining_fee: ₹4,999 + GST (~₹5,898) OR First Year for Secured Card (Min ₹1 Lakh FD)
welcome_benefits: 5,000 IndiGo BluChips, Meal Voucher, 3-Month EazyDiner Prime Membership, and Postcard Hotel Voucher Worth ₹3,000 (Paid Variant Only). 3,000 IndiGo BluChips Voucher on Spending ₹1 Lakh Within 90 Days (Both Paid and Secured Variant)

Rewards Rate: Up to 22 BluChips/₹100 for Flight Bookings Via the IndiGo Website/App. 0.5 BluChips/₹100 for UPI, Rent, Utility, Insurance, and Wallet Spends, and 3 BluChips/₹100 for Other Eligible Spends
Reward Redemption: BluChips Can Be Used for IndiGo Flight Bookings
Golf: 4 Complimentary Golf Rounds and 12 Complimentary Golf Lessons Annually (Mastercard World Benefit)
Insurance Benefits: Trip Cancellation Cover for Flight and Hotel Bookings Up to ₹25,000. Other Travel Insurance Covers are Also Offered

product_details: This is an airline co-branded credit card.
Those who often fly with IndiGo, India’s largest airline, would benefit the most from this card.
The IndiGo IDFC First Credit Card offers up to 22 BluChips/₹100 spent on the IndiGo website and app.
This card offers a low forex charge of 1.49% making it ideal for those who travel internationally.
